issue.title: Split appropriate DRCSim ROS plugins out of atlas_msgs

content.raw: The file structure is more about making the build work properly. The plugins in `drcsim/plugins/` have no ros dependencies. Any of the plugins in ros/atlas_msgs are there because they have ros dependencies, and we started using `rosbuild` at build-time for message generation and generating xacro models (atlas with and without hands for example). We made it a priority to add these new features rather than optimize the file structure.
